subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk, with his unimposing drives and monotonously accurate iron play, is always the unnoticed golfer, but he’s only three strokes behind the co-leaders.
snippet: Jim Furyk, with his unimposing drives and monotonously accurate iron play, is always the unnoticed golfer, but he’s only three strokes behind the co-leaders.
